title: Practice Challenge
description:
Create a function that converts Celsius to Fahrenheit:
1. Name it celsiusToFahrenheit
2. It should take one parameter: celsius
3. Formula: (celsius * 9/5) + 32
4. Return the result
5. Test by calling it with 0, 100, and 37
